actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 511(d) of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 (21 U.S.C. 881(d)) to raise the monetary limit applicable to drug-related judicial forfeitures from $2,500 to $10,000.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 to raise the monetary limit applicable to drug-related judicial forfeitures for violation of the customs laws from $2,500 to $10,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 511(d) of the Comprehensive Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 (21 U.S.C. 881(d)) to raise the monetary limit applicable to drug-related judicial forfeitures from $2,500 to $10,000.
